public class DropDownPanel
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel

A popup panel that can position itself below another widget.

Constructor Detail

DropDownPanel

public DropDownPanel()
Method Detail

showBelow

public void showBelow(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget showBelowMe)
The default position of the DropDown is directly below its associated widget's, with its left edge aligned with the left edge of the box. Depending on the width and height of the popup and the distance from the box to the bottom and right edges of the window, the popup may be displayed directly above the box, and/or its right edge may be aligned with the right edge of the box.
